question: Which of the following was not one of the lawyers to fight the case of Indian National Army in 1946 in the Delhi Red Fort trial?
explanation: Sardar Vallabh Bhai Patel was not amongst the laywers who fought the case of Indian National Army in 1946 in the Delhi Red Fort trial. The lawyers included: Bhulabhai Desai, Pandit Jawahar Lal Nehru, Dr. Kailash Nath Katju.
